name: Partners in Crime Key Ring Set - Silver or Gold
description:
Keep one key ring for yourself and give one to your partner in crime ;D

These awesome custom designed pendants by Yardley December are made from laser cut mirrored acrylic and the lettering is engraved on the pendants. Each pendant measures approx 1.25" x 2". 

Available in either Silver or Gold!

Please note that any variations in the color is simply a reflection since the material is mirrored

name: Dia de los Muertos Sugar Skull Earrings - Wood
description:
These beautiful Dia De Los Muertos (Day of the Dead) Sugar Skull Earrings are custom designed by Yardley December and are made from laser cut and engraved wood.

They are very light weight and feature 2 beautiful Swarovski Light Colorado Topaz beads above the skulls. Skull pendants measure approx 1.5" in size and hang from gold tone French earring wires.

name: Minx Necklace - Silver
description:
You are such a minx!

This is a custom designed, laser cut necklace made from silver mirrored acrylic. Lettering is laser engraved into the acrylic.

Heart shaped pendant measures approx .75" x .75" in size and hangs on a silver tone chain that is approx 19" long in length. This necklace also features a lovely custom Yardley December tag that hangs at the back of the neck!

Please note that any variations in the color is simply a reflection since the material is mirrored.

name: Voyage Queen Cameo Necklace
description:
This Limited Edition "Voyage Queen" Cameo Necklace is a collaborative piece with California based pinup artist, Andrea Young and jewelry designer, Yardley December.

This gorgeous necklace features a handcrafted cameo featuring the "Voyage Queen" artwork by Andrea Young. The cameo rests on a custom designed setting made from laser cut, solid black acrylic and embellished with genuine crystal Black Diamond [dark grey in color] Swarovski rhinestones. A beautiful vintage black diamond crystal teardrop charm hangs from the setting.

Necklace hangs on a silver tone chain approx 19" in length and a cute little Yardley December tag hangs at the back of the neck! The cameo setting measures approx 1.75" x 1.5" in size.

name: Partners in Crime Necklace Set - Silver or Gold
description:
Keep one for yourself and give one to your partner in crime ;D

These awesome custom designed pendants are made from laser cut mirrored acrylic and the lettering is engraved on the pendants. Pendants hang from a chain approx 19" in length and each pendant measures approx 1.25" x 2"

Available in either Silver or Gold! 

Please note that any variations in the color is simply a reflection since the material is mirrored!

name: Little Miss Cupcake Necklace
description:
The Little Miss Cupcake Necklace features a custom designed cupcake pendant made from laser cut and engraved silver mirrored acrylic (the bottom half) and laser cut and engraved wood (the top half).

The cupcake pendant measures approx 1.5" x 1.5" in size and hangs on a silver tone chain approx 19" in length. This super cute necklace also features a cute Yardley December tag at the back of the neck!

Photo Credit: Model - Kari Shannon / Photographer - Fels Andermathes

name: Tattooed Beauty Necklace - Silver
description:
Simply put: Tattoos are beautiful.

This is a custom designed, laser cut necklace by Yardley December made from silver mirrored acrylic. Lettering is laser engraved into the acrylic.

Heart shaped pendant measures approx .75" x .75" in size and hangs on a silver tone chain that is approx 19" long in length. This necklace also features a lovely custom Yardley December tag that hangs at the back of the neck!

Please note that any variations in the color is simply a reflection since the material is mirrored.

name: Dia de los Muertos Sugar Skull Earrings - Clear
description:
These super lovely Dia De Los Muertos (Day of the Dead) Sugar Skull Earrings are custom designed by Yardley December and are made from laser cut and engraved clear acrylic.

They are very light weight and feature 2 beautiful Swarovski White Opal AB beads above the skulls. Skull pendants measure approx 1.5" in size and hang from silver tone French earring wires.

name: Rebel Necklace - Silver
description:
"I'm a loner, Dottie. A rebel."

This is a custom designed, laser cut necklace made from silver mirrored acrylic. Lettering is laser engraved into the acrylic.

Heart shaped pendant measures approx .75" x .75" in size and hangs on a silver tone chain that is approx 19" long in length. This necklace also features a lovely custom Yardley December tag that hangs at the back of the neck!

Please note that any variations in the color is simply a reflection since the material is mirrored.

name: AC/DC Tank
description:
Are you about to rock? You should be! And if you are, FIRE!, away in this AC/DC tank!  Black with ladder-woven sides and sliced and tied back.  Perfect for layering - or wear alone for a more revealing style. Longer length looks great with leggings too!
 
Best fit: L-XL
Neck to bottom front:  22”
Measures 18.5” across (flat, unstretched)

This original piece is part of the series, "Iconic Rock," a new collection of upcycled, eco-couture titled, "Upper Cuts." Each piece is designed by Arizona-based artist, Scissored Vixen (Ms. Mindy Timm) and is created exclusively for Revamped Retro.

categories.name: Upper Cuts Collection by Scissored Vixen for Revamped Retro

name: The Who 2007 World Tour Tank
description:
WHO are YOU? Stunning red, white and blue logo from The Who’s 2007 world tour on a black tank with a very unique cut.  Ladder-woven sides with strands at the shoulder holding it all together.  Tour date listing on the back, embellished with slices.  Perfect for layering - or wear alone for a more revealing style.
 
Best fit: M-L
Neck to bottom front:  20”

9 1/2" length, 8" height, 5" wide.

These patented purses are hand-made originals, with a quality guarantee from Revamped Retro. Each purse is signed by the designer & artist, Krystal Wynona.

name: Infinity Ring
description:
Infinity:  Something without limits

Arizona jewelry artist Jeff Klein was inspired by the idea of limitless possibilities while designing the Infinity Ring, which takes on the very symbol as the design.

Each ring is handmade in sterling silver.

This amazing, lightweight, ring will become part of you, and it suitable for every day wear.

Available in whole sizes starting at 5 up to 12.  

Size 13 and up can be made for an additional charge.  (please contact us for details at teamretro at revampedretro dot com)

Photo 1:  Infinity Ring from front, modeled by Purrversia
(photo courtesy of Cheshire Visions, (c) 2013.)
Photo 2:  Infinity Ring from back.  Note cross over design enhances ring flexibility and fit.

name: Hypno Kitty Petite
description:
The Littlearth Petite Purse is the Perfect Companion to take out on the Town. A fashionable alternative to some of our expensive purses. This purse is great for the young fashionista.

Petite Features:

Recycled aluminum plate wrapped around two 4" hubcaps.
Bottle Cap Closure
48" nylon strap
Signed and Numbered Certificate of Authenticity
4" x 4" X 5.5" (L x H x W)

The lovely Miss Kate, of Hauspanther, is modeling our Hypno Kitty petite.

description: Created from our hand hammered designs, these handbags are as comfortable on the runway as they are with the evening gown. Features:

Illustration by Krista Brooks

name: Tattoo Bottle Cap Belt
description:
Littlearth’s latest cap belt has a bit of an attitude problem. The Bottle Cap Belt is all about attitude and looking good. Be the first on your block to sport your own new dose of ink.

Our belts can be worn by both guys and dolls! Check it!

ALL SIZES AVAILABLE:

Sizes:
- S - 28.5" - 31.5"
- M - 33" - 36"
-L - 37" - 39.5" 
-XL - 40.5" - 43.5"

name: Auto Seat Belt
description:
We've taken the classic black webbing seatbelt and added a new twist: buckles with amazing automotive finishes! The end of the buckle doubles as a bottle opener! 

This belt makes a great gift - one size adjusts to fit almost everyone.  Guys and dolls! 

ONE SIZE fits 28"-42"

UPDATE!!!!  Now you can get our seat belts with your choice of buckle color all for the same price!  Order your belt with a silver, blue or red buckle today!

name: Acorn Fenderette
description:
High-fashion kicks into high-gear with our line of metallic purses. Featuring industrial components, these purses are all about metal textures with an emphasis on silver. The "Gear Flower" FenderFlair is adorned with star washers and Swarovski Crystals.

Great for weddings and formal occasions!

Photo 1 & 2:  The Lovely Latrice with the Acorn Fenderette.  This amazing purse can go from flashy to classy
(photo courtesy Cheshire Visions)

Photo 3:  Acorn Fenderette
Measures: 6" x 3.75" x 5"

name: Made to Order State Plate Cyclone Flair Purse embellished with Swarovski© (shown in California)
description: The Littlearth CycloneFlair purse takes our popular Cyclone purse and dresses it up in hundreds of Swarovski crystals. The effect is spark-tacular. A metal chain, pave´crystal bottle cap closure and special RoadFlair "inspection sticker" add to the allure. Plus each RoadFlair arrives with a signed and numbered certificate of authenticity. This is the original license plate purse that started it all. An Authentic license plate is wrapped around two 4" chrome hubcaps. This purse also features a plush felt lining and an elastic lipstick holder. Photo #1: California Photo #2: Illinois Photo #3: Hawaii Please note these are real recycled plates! Every plate is different! We can't guarantee a specific style within a requested state. For example, the Arizona plate may have a desert scene at the bottom, or be red with white letters. But they all look cool! The State Plate Purses are available in a number of different designs! Click HERE to see the other available options. You can also click HERE to see the full product pictures on our Facebook Fan page with the different patterns available.

name: Made to Order State Plate Cyclone Purse (shown in Arizona)
description: This is the original license plate purse that started it all. An Authentic license plate is wrapped around two 4" chrome hubcaps. This purse also features a plush felt lining and an elastic lipstick holder. Photo #1: Arizona Photo #2: Georgia Photo #3: Colorado Please note these are real recycled plates! Every plate is different! We can't guarantee a specific style within a requested state. For example, the Arizona plate may have a desert scene at the bottom, or be red with white letters. But they all look cool!) The State Plate Purses are available in a number of different designs! Click HERE to see the other available options. You can also click HERE to see the full product pictures on our Facebook Fan page with the different patterns available.

name: Wine Caddy (shown in Wallpaper)
description: These stylish wine caddies are a unique gift for weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, graduations... the possibilities are endless! Also great to take on picnics and outings! Photo #1: Dahlias Photo #2: Rainbow Fractal Photo #3: Dragon Features: - Two metal designer plates wrapped around two 4" chrome hubcaps - Felt lining - Elastic strap to hold bottle in place - Elastic holder for bottle opener - 20" nylon strap - Bottle Cap/Snap closure - Length 4" x Width 13" x Height 4" NOTE: Holds most standard red/white wine and champagne bottles up to 12" high. The Wine Caddies are available in a number of different designs! Click HERE to see the other available options. You can also click HERE to see the full product pictures on our Facebook Fan page with the different patterns available.

name: Made to Order Cyclone Purse (shown in Scarlet Song Bird)
description: This is the original license plate purse that started it all. A Designer license plate is wrapped around two 4" chrome hubcaps. This purse also features a plush felt lining and an elastic lipstick holder. Photo 1: Scarlet Song Bird Photo 2: Lotus Photo 3: Digital Houndstooth Features: - A designer plate wrapped around two 4" chrome hubcaps - 48" recycled rubber strap - Elastic Lipstick holder - Signed and numbered Certificate of Authenticity - 6.5" x 4" x 4" (L x H x W) The Cyclone Purse is available in a number of different designs! Click HERE to see the other available options. You can also click HERE to see the full product pictures on our Facebook Fan page with the different patterns available.

name: Made to Order Cyclone Flair Purse embellished with Swarovski© (shown in Winged Star)
description: The Littlearth RoadFlair purse takes our popular Cyclone purse and dresses it up in hundreds of Swarovski crystals. The effect is spark-tacular. Each crystal is applied by hand to turn this into an amazing one-of-a-kind bag that looks great with everything from jeans to evening wear! Photo 1: Winged Star Photo 2: Runway Photo 3: Peacock Pink Features: - A designer plate wrapped around two 4" chrome hubcaps - Crystallized Bottle Cap closure - Hundreds of Swarovski Crystals - 40" Chain Strap - Elastic Lipstick Holder - Signed and numbered Certificate of Authenticity - 6.5" x 4" x 4" (L x H x W) The Cyclone Flair Purse is available in a number of different designs! Click HERE to see the other available options. You can also click HERE to see the full product pictures on our Facebook Fan page with the different patterns available.

name: Made to Order Super Cyclone Purse (shown in True Love)
description: The Super Cyclone features 2 Designer license plates wrapped around 6-inch chrome hubcaps. There's also a recycled rubber handle and a cool recycled rubber/bottle cap snap closure. Inside, it's felt lined, and an elastic lipstick holder keeps your lipstick close at hand. The well-rounded Super Cyclone turns heads and displays a strong fashion personality! Photo 1 : True Love Photo 2: Jackson Photo 3: Dragon Features: - 9" recycled rubber handle - Signed and numbered Certificate of Authenticity - 9" x 5.5" x 5.5" (L x H x W) The Super Cyclone Purse is available in a number of different designs! Click HERE to see the other available options. You can also click HERE to see the full product pictures on our Facebook Fan page with the different patterns available.

name: Made to Order Super Cyclone Flair with Swarovski© (shown in Dragon)
description: The Littlearth Designer Super Flair purse takes our popular Super Cyclone purse and dresses it up in hundreds of Swarovski crystals. The effect is spark-tacular! Each crystal is applied by hand to turn this into an amazing one-of-a-kind bag that looks great with everything from jeans to evening wear. The well-rounded Super Flair turns heads and displays a strong fashion personality! Photo 1: Dia De Los Muertos Photo 2: Dragon Photo 3: Winged Star Features: - A "super" plate wrapped around two 6" chrome hubcaps - 21" recycled rubber strap - 9" recycled rubber handle - Fully-lined velvet interior with velvet pocket - Signed and numbered Certificate of Authenticity - 9" x 5.5" x 5.5" (L x H x W) The Super Cyclone Flair Purse is available in a number of different designs! Click HERE to see the other available options. You can also click HERE to see the full product pictures on our Facebook Fan page with the different patterns available.

name: Made to Order Fender Purse (shown in New York Skyline)
description: The Fender is a truly unique Littlearth handbag which fully displays our signature license plates and designer plates as 6" x 12" miniature works of art. This handbag is sure to bring a flash of inspiration to any outfit. The sides of the bag are actually recycled aluminum, printed with a wallpaper pattern using a special dye-sublimation process that fuses the graphic right into the metal! Photo 1: New York Skyline Photo 2: Watercolor Love Photo 3: Key to Love Photo 4: Wallpaper Photo 5: Fleur de Lis Features: - Two license plates and unique chrome teardrop shaped ends - Crystallized twist-knob closure - 21" recycled rubber strap - Fully-lined velvet interior with velvet pocket - Signed and numbered Certificate of Authenticity - 12.5" x 6" x 3" The Fender Purse is available in a number of different designs! Click HERE to see the other available options.

name: Made to Order Fender Flair Purse with Swarovski© (show in Beauty)
description: The Fender Flair is the first Littlearth handbag to fully display our signature license plates and designer plates as 6" x 12" miniature works of art. This handbag is sure to bring a flash of inspiration to any outfit! Photo 1: Beauty Photo 2: Buddha Photo 3: Victoria Features: - Two license plates and unique chrome teardrop shaped ends - Crystallized twist-knob closure - Hundreds of Swarovski Crystals - 21" recycled rubber strap - Fully-lined velvet interior with velvet pocket - Signed and numbered Certificate of Authenticity - 12.5" x 6" x 3" (L x H x W) The Fender Flair Purse is available in a number of different designs! Click HERE to see the other available options. You can also click HERE to see the full product pictures on our Facebook Fan page with the different patterns available.

description: Own a piece of pop culture elegance. Exquisite artwork from around the world makes the Fenderette a must-have for every fashionista. Photo 1: Jackson Photo 2: Peacock Blue Photo 3: Buddha Features: - Two license plates and unique chrome teardrop shaped ends - Crystallized twist-knob closure - Fully-lined velvet interior with velvet pocket - 21" Leather/Chain strap - 9" Rubber handle - Signed and numbered Certificate of Authenticity - 6" x 6" x 3" (L x H x W) The Fenderette Purse is available in a number of different designs! name: Made to Order Fenderette Flair Purse embellished with Swarovski© (shown in Midnight Garden)
description: Our best selling Fender purse is now scaled for an evening of excitement. Take yourself from a chic day at the shops to a hot night on the town. Photo 1: Midnight Garden is shown Photo 2: Dia de los Muertos is shown Photo 3: True Love is shown Features: - Two license plates and unique chrome teardrop shaped ends - Crystallized closure - Hundreds of Swarovski Crystals - 21" Leather/Chain strap - 9" crystal embellished rubber handle - Fully-lined velvet interior with velvet pocket - Signed and numbered Certificate of Authenticity - 6" x 5" x 3.75" (L x H x W) The Fender Flairette Purse is available in a number of different designs! name: Made to Order Super Cyclone Purse (Available in all Pro/NCAA teams)
description: Carry all of your game day essentials in this stylish yet practical handbag. Two full size license plates form the body of this unique purse. The bag is felt lined and features a special lipstick holder. Get one in your favorite MLB, NBA, NFL, NHL or NCAA team! Photo 1: Dallas Cowboys (NFL) Photo 2: Chicago Bulls (NBA) Photo 3: New York Islanders (NHL) Features: - Two 6" x 12" recycled aluminum license plates - Chrome plated hubcap ends - Leather strap with contrast stitching - Felt interior lining with lipstick holder - Handcrafted in the USA - 9" x 5.5" x 5.5" - 9" leather strap The purse shown in the photo is the Arizona Cardinals purse. Want it in your favorite team? Click HERE for a full list of Pro-League teams available and click HERE for a list of NCAA teams available. You can also click HERE to see the full product pictures on our Facebook Fan page with the different patterns available.

name: Gift Certificate
description:
Can't decide what to get that special person in your life?  Give them the gift of CHOICE with a gift certificate!  Just like the timeless beauty of our accessories, our gift certificates never expire.  

Starting at $10, available in amounts of $5 increments.

For additional options, please contact us by email:  recycledrascals at gmail dot com

name: Gift Wrapping (optional)
description:
Inspired by one of our customer, gift wrapping is now an option to add on to your order.
We offer both seasonal and birthday wrapping for your packages.  We will also wrap in non-themed paper, if you choose!

Our price is $1.50 per package.  Beats the competition!

Be sure to include notes about which items you want wrapped in "notes to merchant" section during check out.  Or, you can email instructions to us at recycledrascals at gmail dot com.
